Message.Msg: Well now, after a 67 point drubbing on the Nasdaq it is trading at 3005! There are many saying IBM is steady and a buy at $193! I am not so sure about that. The market is in correction and nobody knows when it will turn around. Also, nobody knows when IBM has bottomed because it has pierced all key technical levels in heavy volume. If it trades down to $183 i would think that would be a good entry point? But, who knows? It can go much lower. Good luck!

After several hours of crunching the numbers my computer has just confirmed that there is no way the stock price will go below $204.6725. ,,, seriously, I think you'll see support at ~ 189.75 to 190.25 lot of variables with the current market, but I'll be starting to buy there. one of the variables is that if things really start to go south, IBM will benefit from a "rush to quality"

"The EPS report looks like it may be the catalyst to move the IBM stock higher? We shall see" It may be time to re-think this range for now.This kind of declarative language about the future belies the vagaries of the market.

Message.Title: It's time to protect your 401k's, Almost every company that have reported earnings are also reporting big layoffs
Message.Msg: It's time to protect your 401k's, Almost every company that have reported earnings are also reporting big layoffs
No tax concequences for either Stock Buyback or Stocksplit only for dividend increas.
Good points,but I may start back in if IBM holds 194 Monday.

Topic.Title: Step in, this is the bottom

Message.Msg: I think you've made your point, no need to keep saying same thing. IBM is a bargain.

Topic.Title: IBM Yahoo Finance charts - all on one screen - for free

Message.Title: Why this is bottom price
Message.Msg: In 2011, IBM price moved between $175 to $195 in average. In 2011, income expectation was around $13.20, IBM reported $13.44. For 2012, income expectation (confirmed by IBM) is $15.13 For 2012, IBM earns about $1.70 more than 2011 which translates to $20 to 25 higher price than 2011. For 2012, IBM should trade at min of $195 and max of $220. Regardless of the market direction, IBM price at the end of 2012 should be above the mid range of 2012. We are almost close to the end of 2012 and IBM price should be above the mean or $208. S&P has target of $227 for IBM. Current IBM price is below min range and big guys are crunching number.They know for sure that this is the best opportunity to buy the most stable and reliable stock at very low price.
